name: Test Chamber Evaluator
description:
Important:

Godot's HTML export is pretty broken, so you will need to download the game as an executabe to get the correct / good graphics

This is my submission for the Wowie game jam. (Also my first game jam ever)

Hello Scientists,

at Shutter Inovations Ltd. we are always working hard to create new amazing inovations!

But those inovations need intense testing. Thus we created lots of  Testchambers where our subjects will thoroughly evaluate our new products.

Sometimes our designers fail to create fail-safe Testchambers though. 
Subjects have found them self to brick the chambers making them impossible to solve

It will be your job to find all ways to break our chambers so our testing can continue without any problems! 
Basicaly try to get rid of all cubes.

The only qualifactions for this job are that you can remember these controls:

- Use "E" to interact / pickup objects
- Use "Mouse 1" to throw objects
- Use "Tab" to see your progress

Keep On Inovating

Yours truly,
Cavern Johnson
